Text:
I downloaded this + loader by daz as instructed and now have windows 7 working perfect! =) 

seeing as there were some install notes left out here I will say: 

Install this over working windows version. Put blank serial number in (nothing). Then launch daz loader in windows 7. click uninstall. reboot. use daz loader again. click install. reboot. then go to windows authorization site. authorize. watch out for popup in browser, and allow. enjoy! =)

thanks!
